scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run coverage-check
scripts.coverage-unit: NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha --dir coverage-unit -- --recursive test/unit
scripts.coverage-functional: NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha --dir coverage-functional -- --recursive test/functional
scripts.coverage-integration: NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha --dir coverage-integration -- --recursive test/integration
scripts.init: npm run init-db && npm run migrate
scripts.test-integration-env: npm run lint && NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test-integration mocha --recursive test/
scripts.init-db: createuser -s -d big_poppa; createdb big_poppa; createdb big_poppa_test
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate-dev && npm run migrate-test
scripts.start-worker: npm run migrate-dev && NODE_PATH=./lib node lib/workers
scripts.start-http: npm run migrate-dev && NODE_PATH=./lib node lib/http
scripts.rollback: npm run rollback-dev && npm run rollback-test
